channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Fancier Author Box by ThematoSoup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Fancier Author Box by ThematoSoup

item.title: CVE-2022-3833|2024-08-03T01:20:58.600Z -- unknown -- fancier%20author%20box%20by%20thematosoup
item.description: The Fancier Author Box by ThematoSoup WordPress plugin through 1.4 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
